common.checkMessage:
Authentic OliveChain product. 
 This olive oil was traced and verified from the grove to the shelf.
common.checkDes: Each bottle is protected by a secure NFC tag and a digital token on the blockchain. The tag is tamper-proof — once broken, it becomes unreadable. This guarantees that every verified bottle you open is 100% authentic and fully traceable.
common.errorMessage:
This tag cannot be verified. 
 Please contact your retailer.
common.errorDes: Each bottle produced by Caiyunzhinan is protected by a secure NFC tag and a digital token on the blockchain. The tag is tamper-proof — once broken, it becomes unreadable. This guarantees that every verified bottle you open is 100% authentic and fully traceable. If your bottle cannot be verified, it might mean that the bottle was tampered with, or that the NFC is malfunctioning. Please contact your retailer for more information.
common.step3Desc: Handled by Athena Distribution – temperature controlled
common.certificteDes: This certificate is proof that the bottle of olive oil you have purchased is authentic and hasn’t been tampered with. You can find more details about it below:
common.copySuccess: Certificate link copied! Share it with your friends!
common.shareSuccess: Check out the certificate for Caiyunzhilan Olive Oil!
